course_title: Advanced Seminar: Research on Text Mining
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 15 / Seats Avail: 9Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: This is a research-lab type course to apply NLP methods to research about climate change, democratization, and histories of contemporary events.  Topics may include data gathering and cleaning, the development of a public-facing interface, moving from statistical analysis to GPT, and cutting-edge readings in interdisciplinary applications of NLP.
course_description: Selected advanced topics in quantitative sciences. Open only to junior and senior majors; others by permission of instructor.
schedule_location: W 8am-11am in New Psyc Bldg 561 (36 Eagle Ro
